item.title: Syllable of Grace
item.fluff: The sigil Uur flares with pale light, lending grace and speed to your movements

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You roll Initiative
Effect: You gain a +2 item bonus to the triggering check.
Level 12: +3 item bonus.
Level 22: +5 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must be able to speak Abyssal or Supernal.
Effect: You speak the syllable, and it orbits your head. You gain a +2 bonus to AC against opportunity attacks, and a +2 item bonus to speed. These effects last until the end of the encounter.
Level 12: +2 bonus to all defenses against triggered attacks.
Level 22: +4 bonus to all defenses against triggered attacks, and a +3 item bonus to speed.
Special: When the effect ends, the whole syllable disappears.

item.title: Syllable of Life
item.fluff: When Hoon shines, you feel vigorous and youthful, as if no hurt could ever stop you

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You spend one or more healing surges to regain hit points
Effect: You gain a +4 item bonus to your healing surge value for the triggering event.
Level 23: +6 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must be able to speak Abyssal or Supernal.
Effect: You speak the syllable, and it orbits your head. You gain regeneration 10 while bloodied until the end of the encounter.
Level 23: Regeneration 15.
Special: When the effect ends, the whole syllable disappears.

item.title: Syllable of Spirit
item.fluff: When you manifest Vaul's brilliant light, your spirit shines with uncommon brightness, making it hard for other enemies to strike you

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must be bloodied
Effect: You are phasing until the end of your next turn, or until you are no longer bloodied, whichever comes first.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must be able to speak Abyssal or Supernal.
Effect: You speak the syllable, and it orbits your head. Until the end of the encounter you are phasing and, while you are bloodied, gain insubstantial.
Special: When the effect ends, the whole syllable disappears.

item.title: Syllable of Strength
item.fluff: Aesh burns brightly, filling you with uncommon power and strength

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit with an attack
Effect: You gain a +3 power bonus to damage with the triggering attack.
Level 20: +5 power bonus.
Level 30: +8 power bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must be able to speak Abyssal or Supernal.
Effect: You speak the syllable, and it orbits your head. You gain a +3 item bonus to damage rolls until the end of the encounter.
Level 20: +5 item bonus.
Level 30: +8 item bonus.
Special: When the effect ends, the whole syllable disappears.

item.title: Syllable of Thought
item.fluff: Naen's shining beacon clarifies your thoughts, helping you to anticipate danger

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You trigger one or more opportunity attacks
Effect: You gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against all the opportunity attacks you triggered.
Level 14: +3 bonus.
Level 24: +4 bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must be able to speak Abyssal or Supernal.

Effect: You speak the syllable, and it orbits your head. You do not grant combat advantage, and gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with opportunity attacks. These effects last until the end of the encounter.
Level 14: +2 bonus to all defenses against triggered attacks.
Level 24: +4 bonus to all defenses against triggered attacks, and a +3 item bonus to speed.
Special: When the effect ends, the whole syllable disappears.
